categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Nobu was a group of 4 Cargo ferries belonging to the Rebel Alliance in the Airam sector during the operations of Task Force Vengeance.

When the decision was made to construct a shipyard in Airam space, Nobu, were part of a Rebel convoy charged with bringing the needed supplies and personnel. Nobu group contained construction equipment. Unfortunately for the Rebels, the Galactic Empire had learned of them and readied a trap in the Rocrin system. Nobu were destroyed along with all the others.
